headline: My 5 Favorite Stocks to Buy Right Now
summary: As Warren Buffett once said, "When investing, pessimism is your friend, euphoria the enemy."  If you're looking for some investing inspiration today, my five favorite stocks to buy right now are Realty Income (NYSE: O), MercadoLibre (NASDAQ: MELI), Dutch Bros (NYSE: BROS), Carnival (NYSE: CCL)(NYSE: CUK), and On Holding (NYSE: ONON).
